snippet: After being stymied in their effort to move to Los Angeles, the Raiders agreed to a one-year lease extension to remain at the Oakland Coliseum through the 2016 season.
abstract: Oakland Raiders sign one-year lease on Oakland Coliseum after their request with NFL to move to Los Angeles is denied.
lead_paragraph: After being stymied in their effort to move to Los Angeles, the Raiders agreed to a one-year lease extension to remain at the Oakland Coliseum through the 2016 season.

headline.main: Raiders Staying Put for Now in Oakland
